ParameterFields.Name: Link Captured Exit
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Which exit this Floormaster takes Link through when it captures him.

ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The unused Stalker type follows Link without coming out of the floor. That type only appears when its Enable Spawn Switch is set while in the same room as the Floormaster.

ParameterFields.Name: Path
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Only the "Follows path" type uses this path.

ParameterFields.Name: Partner Captured Exit
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Which stage exit this Floormaster takes Medli/Makar through when it captures them.

ParameterFields.Name: Sight Range (Hundreds)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: Defaults to a range of 3000 if you set this to 0 or 255.
